info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:48PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Powell County through 615 PM MDT... At 547 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Garrison, or near Deer Lodge, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Garrison. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 168 and 179. Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 0 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for west central Montana.
